attributes.action: Prohibit all parading in Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PROHIBIT ALL PARADES (ORANGE ORDER, ANCIENT ORDER OF THE HIBERNIANS ETC) IN NORTHERN IRELAND.  PARADES OCCUR IN AREAS THEY ARE NOT WANTED OR WELCOME CAUSING RESIDENTS OF THOSE COMMUNITIES TO FEEL THREATENED AND ANTAGONISM.  A BLANKET BAN ON ALL PARADING WILL ENSURE THERE IS NO DISCRIMINATION BETWEEN PARTICULAR PARADES.  ASIDE FROM THE ANTAGONISM CAUSED, THE COST OF POLICING AND CLEANING UP AFTER PARADES IS NOT JUSTIFIABLE ESPECIALLY IN OUR CURRENT ECONOMIC SITUATION.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
